alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:21PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Twin Falls County through 145 PM MDT... At 120 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hollister, or 11 miles south of Twin Falls, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Twin Falls, Kimberly, Hansen and Filer around 140 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
